Package au.edu.anu.twapps.mm.graphEditor

Interface Specifications

All Known Implementing Classes:
TwSpecifications
public interface Specifications
Author Ian Davies -10 Jan. 2019

This interface is the contract between the 3Worlds archetype and what a configuration graph builder (i.e. ModelMaker) requires.

  • Method Details

    • getSpecsOf

      fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode getSpecsOf​(VisualNodeEditable editNode, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.TreeNode root, Set<String> discoveredFiles)
      Get specification of a given node in the configuration graph. This is a recursive function, called when searching all sub-archetype files. Ultimately, the caller should ensure that a specification has been found and throw an exception if this is not the case.

      The method must add an entry for each archetype file it opens.

      Parameters:
      editNode - VisualNodeEditable interface of the VisualNode being edited.
      root - The root node of the specification archetype tree.
      discoveredFiles - Archetype files that have currently been searched.
      Returns:
      The specification TreeNode (often null during recursive searches).

    • getSubSpecsOf

      fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode getSubSpecsOf​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpecs, Class<? extends fr.cnrs.iees.graph.TreeNode> subClass)
      Get sub-class specification of a given node in the configuration graph. Null is returned if the node has no sub-class specification.
      Parameters:
      baseSpecs - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subClass - The java class of the node.
      Returns:
      The sub-class specification if one exists.

    • getChildSpecsOf

      Iterable<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> getChildSpecsOf​(VisualNodeEditable editParent, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode subSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.TreeNode root)
      Get a list of the specifications of all potential children of the parent node.
      Parameters:
      editParent - VisualNodeEditable interface of the parent VisualNode.
      baseSpec - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subSpec - The sub-class specification (can be null) returned by getSubSpecsOf.
      root - Archetype tree root.
      Returns:
      List of possible child specifications.

    • getEdgeSpecsOf

      Iterable<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> getEdgeSpecsOf​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode subSpec)
      Get a list of the specifications of all possible out-edges from the given base and sub-class specifications.
      Parameters:
      baseSpec - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subSpec - The sub-class specification returned by getSubSpecsOf (can be null).
      Returns:
      List of edge specifications (can be empty).

    • getPropertySpecsOf

      Iterable<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> getPropertySpecsOf​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode subSpec)
      Get a list of all property specifications from the given base and sub-class specifications.
      Parameters:
      baseSpec - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subSpec - The sub-class specification returned by getSubSpecsOf (can be null).
      Returns:
      List of property specifications (can be empty).

    • getMultiplicityOf

      au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.util.IntegerRange getMultiplicityOf​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode spec)
      Returns the IntegerRange property value of the specification's multiplicity property.
      Parameters:
      spec - The specification.
      Returns:
      IntegerRange which must exist.

    • nameStartsWithUpperCase

      boolean nameStartsWithUpperCase​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode spec)
      Ask if the name of the element in the given specification must begin with an upper-case letter.
      Parameters:
      spec - The specification containing the name property.
      Returns:
      true if constraint exists, false otherwise.

    • getSubClassesOf

      List<Class<? extends fr.cnrs.iees.graph.TreeNode>> getSubClassesOf​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode spec)
      Get all java classes applicable to the given specification. These classes are presented to the user for selection when constructing a node for the configuration graph.
      Parameters:
      spec - The specification.
      Returns:
      List of all java classes in the class hierarchy of the class specified.

    • getQueries

      List<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> getQueries​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode spec, Class<? extends au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.queries.Queryable>... queryClasses)
      Get a list of all queries (constraints) of the given class referenced by the specification.
      Parameters:
      spec - The specification root to search for queries.
      queryClasses - List of query classes being sort.
      Returns:
      List of query specifications matching any of these supplied queryClasses.

    • getQueryStringTables

      List<String[]> getQueryStringTables​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode spec, Class<? extends au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.queries.Queryable> queryClass)
      Get a list of Query parameters for the given query class within the specification.
      Parameters:
      spec - The specification to search.
      queryClass - Query class sort.
      Returns:
      List of query parameters.

    • filterPropertyStringTableOptions

      boolean filterPropertyStringTableOptions​(Iterable<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> propertySpecs, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode subSpec, String childId, Class<? extends au.edu.anu.rscs.aot.queries.Queryable>... queryClasses)
      Present user optional property choices when constructing a new node for the configuration graph.
      Parameters:
      propertySpecs - List of eligible property specifications.
      baseSpec - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subSpec - The sub-class specification returned by getSubSpecsOf (can be null).
      childId - Label of the child being constructed.
      queryClasses - Applicable query (constraint).
      Returns:
      true if option was chosen by the user, false otherwise.

    • getNodeLabelDuples

      List<fr.ens.biologie.generic.utils.Duple<String,​String>> getNodeLabelDuples​(List<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> queries)
      Get a list of pairs of "NodeLabel1" and "NodeLabel2" pairs for application of other query choices (cf: OutNodeXorQuery).
      Parameters:
      queries - List of query specifications.
      Returns:
      Pairs of NodeLabel1 and NodeLabel2 values.

    • filterRequiredPropertyQuery

      void filterRequiredPropertyQuery​(VisualNode node, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode subSpec)
      Filters properties in a newly constructed node with reference to contraints imposed by RequirePropertyQuery
      Parameters:
      node - The node containing the properties.
      baseSpec - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subSpec - The sub-class specification returned by getSubSpecsOf (can be null).

    • getOptionalProperties

      List<fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode> getOptionalProperties​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode baseSpec, fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.SimpleDataTreeNode subSpec)
      Get a list of the optional property specifications (0..1) whose optionality is not constrained by some other query,
      Parameters:
      baseSpec - The base specification returned by getSpecsOf
      subSpec - The sub-class specification returned by getSubSpecsOf (can be null).
      Returns:
      List of property specifications marked optional (can be empty).
